hints.content:
$\blueD{25}$ is the smallest whole number that rounds to $30$.

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line labeled 20 to 40 with tick marks at every 1 unit. The tick marks at 20, 25, 30, and 40 are labeled. The tick mark for 25 is blue. !

hints.content:
$\blueD{34}$ is the greatest whole number that rounds to $30$.

[[☃ image 1]]

So, any whole number from $\blueD{25}$ to $\blueD{34}$ rounds to $30$.

options.alt: A number line labeled 20 to 40 with tick marks at every 1 unit. The tick marks at 20, 25, 30, 34, and 40 are labeled. The tick marks for 25 and 34 are blue. !

A number line labeled 20 to 40 with tick marks at every 1 unit. The tick marks at 20, 25, 30, 34, and 40 are labeled. The tick marks for 25 and 34 are blue. A blue line runs along the number line from the tick mark at 25 to the tick mark at 34. !

question.content:
**Which number line highlights all whole numbers that round to $30$ if we are rounding to the nearest ten?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A number line labeled 20 to 40 with tick marks at every 1 unit. The tick marks at 20, 24, 30, 35, and 40 are labeled. The tick marks for 24 and 35 are blue. A blue line runs along the number line from the tick mark at 24 to the tick mark at 35.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/39693f907edd345a6a764fdc197492e43cfb9823)

![A number line labeled 20 to 40 with tick marks at every 1 unit. The tick marks at 20, 25, 30, 34, and 40 are labeled. The tick marks for 25 and 34 are blue. A blue line runs along the number line from the tick mark at 25 to the tick mark at 34.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/2fc62b01680a6beebff7c7e999e25abff750f0d3)

![A number line labeled 20 to 40 with tick marks at every 1 unit. The tick marks at 20, 27, 30, 37, and 40 are labeled. The tick marks for 27 and 37 are blue. A blue line runs along the number line from the tick mark at 27 to the tick mark at 37.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/0472b19e70dd602789ee142b5de38a06c9d1c726)
